1924 Rietveld Schröder House, which is listed on UNESCO's world heritage sites

qas.question: What form of art became legal in 2004?
What house was built in the 19th century?
What illistrator is famouse for creating a gnome with a red hat?

context: There are many art galleries in Utrecht. There are also several foundations to support art and artists. <a0_0>Training of artists is done at the Utrecht School of the Arts<a0_0/>. The Centraal Museum has many exhibitions on the arts, including a permanent exhibition on the works of Utrecht resident illustrator <b5_0>Dick Bruna<b5_0/>, who is best known for creating Miffy ("Nijntje", in Dutch). <a1_0>Although <b3_0>street art<b3_0/> is illegal in Utrecht<a1_0/>, the Utrechtse Kabouter, a picture of a gnome with a red hat, became a common sight in 2004. Utrecht also houses one of the landmarks of modern architecture, the <a2_0>1924 <b4_0>Rietveld Schröder House<b4_0/>, which is listed on UNESCO's world heritage sites<a2_0/>.
